snippet.title: GODZILLA: THE ATOMAR NIGHTMARE (ZX Spectrum 48K [UNLICENSED]) Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay showcase of the extremely obscure [unlicensed] Godzilla video game from 1995! NOTE: Due to faulty copyright claim from some "Funky Reggae" person claiming to own part of the Godzilla: Trading Battle soundtrack, ads may appear in this video.
THIS GAME HAS NO MUSIC. THE MUSIC USED IN THIS VIDEO ARE, in order:
- Godzilla 2014 Unreleased Title Music
- The rest are all from the GODZILLA: TRADING BATTLE OST, in order by their track name.

The game is actually very slow-paced, with the raw unsped-up footage being nearly 3 hours. Though to be fair, I did abuse an exploit which made Godzilla go from Osaka to its power plant and back forever which also guaranteed I would win... hey, it IS a strategy game, isn't it?
http://wikizilla.org/wiki/Godzilla:_The_Atomar_Nightmare

Facebook!
https://facebook.com/GodzillaWiki
And of course, visit Wikizilla!
http://wikizilla.org

No copyright infringement intended. 
Godzilla © Toho Co., Ltd.
